short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organise your Slack sidebar by using a yaml file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organise your Slack workspace channels and DMs in to sections using a simple yaml configuration file. Ordering your sidebar helps with productivity and makes it easier to find the right person, team or topic.

Share your sidebar layout with colleagues and create multiple sidebar layout flavours which can be applied instantly.

Exporting your current Slack sidebar is easy and importing is as simple as copy and pasting a configuration file shared with you in to the extension.

The extension will automatically organise DMs and channels in to sections for you and it will even create the sections for you if they don't exist already!
